title: [Placements]Regarding placements eligibility
content:
I wanted to clarify something regarding board exam eligibility. 
During orientation, I recall Jawahar mentioning that a minimum of 60% in 10th grade is required. Is this an official criterion?
Also, is it possible for the eligibility criteria to change later on?"

comments.body: It's not an official criteria as far as I know; Only few companies consider 10th and 12th marks, other all consider only cgpa.
